verse 1: temptation seems so sweet the devil knows exactly where im weak see i got a monkey on my back i can constantly feel my spirit under attack everywhere i go i see him lurking in the shadows waiting just to tempt me and lure me into battles trying to bring me down a feeling pulling at my leg trying to bring me down a feeling messing with my head weighing on my chest like a kevlar vest preoccupying my mind til i forget that im blessed they always want to lead me astray forget about the weight not today they talking to me saying
